identity.name: 3ème Goya Révisions
identity.description: A high-energy, anti-boring revision tool for Gen Z students. It mixes raw, bold aesthetics with soft, friendly interactions.
identity.archetype: Vibrant Play (Archetype 6) with a Neo-Brutalist twist

headings.usage: Main titles, section headers, big impact text

colors.rules: Use solid colors mostly. Gradients only for 'magical' AI moments. All borders must be pure black (#000000).

layout.grid_system: Grid layouts should use the 'Bento' strategy. Mix 1x1 squares with 2x1 or 2x2 rectangles.
layout.spacing: Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) inside cards to prevent cramping.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-xl border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-y-1 hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-xl border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:bg-secondary transition-all

cards.base: bg-white border-2 border-black rounded-xl shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] p-6

inputs.base: border-2 border-black rounded-lg p-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black focus:ring-offset-2 outline-none font-medium

hero.description: Abstract origami shapes representing structured learning

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Neo-Brutalist' style strictly: 2px solid black borders on EVERYTHING.
Use the 'hard shadow' utility class provided in visual_enhancers for all cards and buttons.
The 'Subject Selection' should be a visual grid of cards using the subject images provided, not just a boring dropdown.
The 'Revision Type' selector should be big, chunky toggle buttons.
Use the 'Outfit' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Ensure the 'Welcome Popup' uses the 'alert-dialog' component but styled with the brutalist theme (white bg, black border, hard shadow).
For the 'Generated Content', use a paper-like texture or simple white bg with wide margins to simulate a real revision sheet.
Authentication pages should be simple: Split screen with a big abstract image on one side and the form on the other.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not use rounded-full for buttons unless specified; prefer rounded-xl.
Ensure mobile responsiveness: Stack grids to 1 column on mobile.
